verbose_text: We inhibited FAK activity by ectopic expression of dominant negative constructs (FRNK or FAK Y397F) or depleted FAK with siRNA, and found that these two treatments reduced N-cadherin levels in both cell types on a rigid substratum (XREF_FIG, XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY, XREF_FIG, and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), as did depletion of FAK in cells on stiff hydrogels (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
